AD.synopsis: A signpost in Undercommon marking out the paths to different settlements. Each one is scratched out with a different warning underneath (vanished into sinkhole, overrun by drow, etc)

AD_0.speaker: Narrator
AD_0.text: *The names of settlements are crossed out: Breachstone - sinkhole! Ssalsen - Lolth! Old Kell - demons!*
